subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
Concussions
lead_paragraph: After a series of horrifying injuries to pitchers, most recently to J. A. Happ of the Blue Jays, baseball is considering ways to better protect those on the mound from sizzling line drives.
snippet: After a series of horrifying injuries to pitchers, most recently to J. A. Happ of the Blue Jays, baseball is considering ways to better protect those on the mound from sizzling line drives.
